Andrea Carr <ACARR3@...> wrote:

            Amy,

    I have seen spirits in my house but without any aid. They either zip around really fast so that I only catch a glimpse of them or I have seen them as orbs. I haven�t sued scrying to astral travel a candle flickering. I use a blackened in mirror but you can also do it with a bowl of water, a piece of dark glass or a darkened crystal ball. 

    Here is an excellent book that I recommend reading for it. I did and it�s a great guide: http://cgi.ebay.com/Scrying-for-Beginners-by-Donald-Tyson_W0QQitemZ270004310659QQihZ017QQcategoryZ378QQssPageNameZWDVWQQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem

    Andrea

      I am just looking for other ways of communication. Medium, is what i am interested in, i think that i was given this tool at a young age but have never used it, and tuned it out.


      amy
